# PackageServiceOptionsCodCodAmount

COD Amount container.

**Properties**

| Name           | Type | Required | Description                                        |
| :------------- | :--- | :------- | :------------------------------------------------- |
| currency_code  | str  | ✅       | COD amount currency code type.                     |
| monetary_value | str  | ✅       | COD Amount. Valid values: 0.01 USD to 50000.00 USD |
